__e: Show me where the Enterprise children are in relation to here.
I was on the Enterprise, in the middle of a play. But it was here. It was not real, it was on a stage.
Captain thinks there'll be another Enterprise before too long.
This is the main bridge, the command centre, and our last stop.
You do not belong in charge of the Enterprise and I shall do everything in my power against you.
Captain, the 430 men and women onboard the Enterprise and the ship itself are endangered by these children.
She would even murder me, the captain, the entire crew of the Enterprise, to keep you here with her.
Sounds like the best solution is to take the Enterprise in.
